  • The throw function helps to free up space in the safebox if for example the player holds weapons that they can no longer use, such as weapons specific to a certain faction or rank from that faction if the player is no longer part of such a faction or no longer holds the required rank.

docs.title: Usable capacity of each element
docs.text:
• 1 material - 1 unit.
  • 1 gram of drugs - 1 unit.

Deagle / SD Pistol:

  • Skill 1 Weapon Dealer - 1 bullet ~ occupies 20 units.
  • Skill 2 Weapon Dealer - 1 bullet ~ occupies 17 units.
  • Skill 3 Weapon Dealer - 1 bullet ~ occupies 14 units.
  • Skill 4 Weapon Dealer - 1 bullet ~ occupies 11 units.
  • Skill 5 Weapon Dealer - 1 bullet ~ occupies 8 units.

Shotgun / Combat:

  • Skill 1 Weapon Dealer - 1 bullet ~ occupies 40 units.
  • Skill 2 Weapon Dealer - 1 bullet ~ occupies 35 units.
  • Skill 3 Weapon Dealer - 1 bullet ~ occupies 30 units.
  • Skill 4 Weapon Dealer - 1 bullet ~ occupies 25 units.
  • Skill 5 Weapon Dealer - 1 bullet ~ occupies 20 units.

M4 / AK47:

  • Skill 1 Weapon Dealer - 1 bullet ~ occupies 24 units.
  • Skill 2 Weapon Dealer - 1 bullet ~ occupies 23 units.
  • Skill 3 Weapon Dealer - 1 bullet ~ occupies 22 units.
  • Skill 4 Weapon Dealer - 1 bullet ~ occupies 21 units.
  • Skill 5 Weapon Dealer - 1 bullet ~ occupies 20 units.

MP5 / TEC-9:​​

  • Skill 1 Weapon Dealer - 1 bullet ~ occupies 15 units.
  • Skill 2 Weapon Dealer - 1 bullet ~ occupies 14 units.
  • Skill 3 Weapon Dealer - 1 bullet ~ occupies 13 units.
  • Skill 4 Weapon Dealer - 1 bullet ~ occupies 12 units.
  • Skill 5 Weapon Dealer - 1 bullet ~ occupies 10 units.

Sniper / Sniper Rifle:​​

  • Skill 1 Weapon Dealer - 1 bullet ~ occupies 350 units.
  • Skill 2 Weapon Dealer - 1 bullet ~ occupies 338 units.
  • Skill 3 Weapon Dealer - 1 bullet ~ occupies 325 units.
  • Skill 4 Weapon Dealer - 1 bullet ~ occupies 313 units.
  • Skill 5 Weapon Dealer - 1 bullet ~ occupies 300 units.

docs.title: Slots
docs.text: Slot Machines

docs.title: How to play?
docs.text:
• The command used to play is /spin and can only be used in the following locations in Las Venturas city: 4 Dragons or Redsands West.
  • An amount of money between $1,000 and $50,000 can be inserted into the machine.
  • To play, the desired amount will be inserted into the machine using the arrows and the SPIN button will be pressed.
  • There are a total of 3 columns on the machine screen, along which 5 types of symbols will appear when the SPIN button is pressed: dollar sign, heart, star, skull, tiki statue.
  • The MIN and MAX buttons can be used to directly reach the minimum and maximum value that can be inserted into the machine ($1,000-$50,000).

docs.title: Meaning of each symbol
docs.text:
Each symbol has a different importance and in case of winning, different amounts of money will be collected as follows:

  • Dollar sign - 30 multiplied by the amount inserted into the machine.
  • Heart - 15 multiplied by the amount inserted into the machine.
  • Star - 10 multiplied by the amount inserted into the machine.
  • Tiki statue - 3 multiplied by the amount inserted into the machine.
  • Skull - 2 multiplied by the amount inserted into the machine.

The winnings under the graphical interface are updated according to the value inserted into the machine.

docs.title: Winning chances
docs.text:
• 0.19% chance of getting a line with 3 dollar signs.
  • 0.76% chance of getting a line with 3 hearts
  • 0.76% chance of getting a line with 3 stars
  • 3.32% chance of getting a line with 3 tiki statues
  • 3.32% chance of getting a line with 3 skulls

docs.title: /spin
docs.text: By typing the command, the machine interface will be displayed with which you can play.

docs.title: How long does it take to select the symbols and what are the winning rotations?
docs.text:
• The time required to complete a rotation varies between 4 and 6 seconds (depending on the random values generated by the server).
  • The winning rotation is considered when all 3 symbols of the same type are displayed on the middle line of the machine (for example heart-heart-heart).

docs.title: Trade
docs.text:
Trade

The concept of Trade is found in several strategy games, being an easy method to negotiate with other players. This system is extremely simple. The trade system offers you the possibility to make exchanges safely, sharing houses, businesses, vehicles and money.

docs.title: How to use it?
docs.text:
To successfully complete a deal with one of the players on the B-Zone RPG servers, follow these steps:

  • Type the /trade command, specifying the ID or name of the partner player (example: /trade Adi007).
  • Immediately, the server will open a simple table, as you can see in the image.
  • The table is divided into two equal parts, with your goods on the left side and your partner's goods on the right side.
  • To add an amount of money, a house, a business or a vehicle, press the Add item button and select one of the specified goods from the open list.
  • Once selected, it will appear on the exchange table and will be visible to both participants.
  • As soon as both players have finished adding, both must press the Not ready button, which will be transformed into Ready.
  • If both players have pressed the button, it moves to the next stage, verification.
  • The server will display a timer that initially indicates 10 seconds and counts down to 0. If something is not right with the exchange, you can cancel at any time during those 10 seconds by pressing the Ready button.
  • If no participant interrupts the timer, when the 10 seconds are over, a button called Confirm will appear. Each player must press it.
  • Once this button has been pressed by both participants, the exchange will be successfully executed.

docs.title: Command limits
docs.text:
• The maximum amount of money that can be traded in a single transaction is $2,147,483,647.
  • Small type clans can be sold for a maximum amount of $10,000,000.
  • Medium type clans can be sold for a maximum amount of $20,000,000.
  • Big type clans can be sold for a maximum amount of $30,000,000.
  • Mega type clans can be sold for a maximum amount of $40,000,000.

docs.title: /trade
docs.text: By typing this command, the server will invite a certain player to a goods exchange. The command uses a parameter, the name or ID of the player you want to involve in a goods exchange. For the exchange table to be displayed to both players, the invited player must accept the invitation. The /trade command is protected by PIN.

docs.title: Tutorials
docs.text:
A player in the tutorial (driving school)

The B-Zone team will provide you with a unique and beneficial method to discover the server's features and learn what can happen on one of the B-Zone RPG servers. There are many features that mimic real life, but to know them well enough, you need a wealth of information. The only way to get to know this information is to go through the tutorials directly in the game, in an interactive way. Read the rest of this page's content and you will find out what you need to do to reach the treasure trove of tutorials.

docs.title: About tutorials
docs.text: When you start going through the stages of a tutorial, you should know that some of them are represented only by simple text messages transmitted through message boxes, while others are also practical (to complete them, in addition to reading the information, you also need to perform certain actions, for example: Jobs & Money).

docs.title: Available tutorials
docs.text:
• Driving school.
    • Upon completion of the driving school you will receive your driver's license (driving permit) for a duration of 300 hours (300 paydays received).
  • Tutorial vehicles.
  • Jobs and money (truck driver job).

docs.title: Wanted & Clear
docs.text:
Incarcerated Interface of /su command

These two concepts refer to a player's wanted level (wanted), and the removal of the wanted level (clear). When a player commits crimes, they receive a certain wanted level (wanted), either from a police officer or from the server.

docs.title: Reason for granting wanted
docs.text: Department members are part of well-structured organizations with well-established data, so in order to keep track of players who have committed crimes/violated social rules, they grant them a certain wanted level. The advantage of this wanted level granted by a department member is that if the police officer who granted the wanted level still fails to catch the criminal, they will appear on the police officers' criminal list.

docs.title: Does anyone manage not to end up in jail?
docs.text: If you have been granted a certain wanted level and you wonder if you will escape without being sent to jail, then the answer is yes. The wanted level is counted in the form of stars, which are displayed at the top of the screen (right). Every 15 minutes spent in the game, one star is removed from a criminal. If the criminal gets rid of all stars, they are free and are no longer considered a criminal.

docs.title: List of wanted levels
docs.text:
Legend:

  • Bold text - The wanted level and its reason are automatically granted by the server.
  • Italic text - The wanted level and its reason represent a criminal without the right to surrender.
  • Italic and bold text - The wanted level and its reason are automatically granted by the server and represent a criminal without the right to surrender.

docs.title: Wanted 1 (wanted level 1)
docs.text:
• Vehicle Theft - This can be granted if a player tries to steal a police officer's personal vehicle.
  • Unfounded Call - This can be granted if a player calls the emergency number without having an emergency.
  • Car Jacking - This can be granted by a player if you steal their vehicle.
  • Vehicle Breaking - This is automatically granted when you break into a vehicle (skill 4+ car jacker)
  • Drug Delivery (Skill 3, 4) - This is automatically granted when you deliver drugs.
  • Materials Delivery (Skill 3, 4) - This is automatically granted when you deliver materials.

docs.title: Wanted 2 (wanted level 2)
docs.text:
• Civilian Attack - This can be granted if you attack a player.
  • Failure to Comply with Order - This can be granted if you don't stop after three warnings or if you don't comply with the police officer's requirements.
  • Government Property Trespassing (jail, LSPD Garage, LVPD, SFPD, FBI and NG, Area 51) - This can be granted if you enter government property and do not want to leave the area.

docs.title: Wanted 3 (wanted level 3)
docs.text:
• Kidnapping a civilian - This can be granted if you kidnap a player (mafia rank 3+)
  • Possession / Use of Drugs - This can be granted if you are caught by a police officer possessing drugs or consuming them at that moment.
  • Police Attack (Cop Attack) - This can be granted if you attack a police officer, regardless of whether you shoot a bullet at them or punch them more than three times.
  • Non-payment of Fine - This can be granted if you don't pay the fine, respectively if you don't have money to pay it, you have the right to ask the police officer to take you to the nearest ATM to withdraw money from the bank.
  • Department vehicle theft - This is automatically granted when you steal a department vehicle (skill 5 car jacker)
  • Drug delivery (Skill 5) - This is automatically granted when you deliver drugs.
  • Materials delivery (Skill 5) - This is automatically granted when you deliver materials.

docs.title: Wanted 4 (wanted level 4)
docs.text:
• Drive-by shot or run over *- This is granted when you do a drive-by shooting at a player from a vehicle or if you run over the player, also with a vehicle; an example would be this mission from GTA San Andreas.
  • Bribery - This is granted when you try to bribe a police officer to escape certain sanctions.
  • Murder - This is granted when you kill a player unjustifiably.

docs.title: Wanted 5 (wanted level 5)
docs.text:
• Kidnapping a police officer - This can be granted by a police officer when they are kidnapped, or a colleague of theirs.
  • Cop Kill - This is automatically granted when you kill a police officer on duty.

docs.title: Wanted 6 (wanted level 6)
docs.text:
• Runner (fugitive) - This is granted when you have wanted with the right to surrender and you don't stop to surrender after three warnings.
  • Accomplice to a criminal's escape - This is granted when you help a player with wanted by any method.
  • Bank Robbery - This is automatically granted when you start stealing jewelry or money from a business or rob location.
  • Escape Attempt *- This is automatically granted after one minute, after you have escaped from jail.''

docs.title: With or without the right to surrender
docs.text:
• Having the right to surrender means having the possibility to surrender to a police officer, being arrested and sent to jail.
  • Not having the right to surrender means that police officers have the right to shoot at you to kill you, and you will be sent to jail.

When a player is killed by a police officer, it is considered wanted without the right to surrender, and the server calculates the number of seconds of punishment from the perspective of a crime without the right to surrender (a longer duration).

If a player is arrested, it is considered wanted with the right to surrender, the server calculating based on this aspect a shorter duration of jail sentence.

docs.title: Time spent in jail
docs.text: Depending on the wanted level and its nature (with or without the right), there are several durations of time for which a criminal can be held in jail:

docs.title: With right to surrender
docs.text:
• Wanted 1 (wanted level 1) - 240 seconds in jail
  • Wanted 2 (wanted level 2) - 480 seconds in jail
  • Wanted 3 (wanted level 3) - 600 seconds in jail
  • Wanted 4 (wanted level 4) - 840 seconds in jail
  • Wanted 5 (wanted level 5) - 960 seconds in jail
  • Wanted 6 (wanted level 6) - 1080 seconds in jail

docs.title: Without right to surrender
docs.text:
• Wanted 1 (wanted level 1) - 500 seconds in jail
  • Wanted 2 (wanted level 2) - 1000 seconds in jail
  • Wanted 3 (wanted level 3) - 1500 seconds in jail
  • Wanted 4 (wanted level 4) - 2000 seconds in jail
  • Wanted 5 (wanted level 5) - 2500 seconds in jail
  • Wanted 6 (wanted level 6) - 3000 seconds in jail

docs.title: Clear (removal of wanted level)
docs.text:
This function is usually used when a player's criminal record needs to be cleared for various reasons.

There can be several reasons to remove a player's wanted level, such as: * Removing a wanted level obtained as a result of abuse by a police officer. * Clearing a criminal's record due to wrongly granting wanted, but following a new correct granting of wanted (replay).

docs.title: Wars
docs.text:
Wars

Wars are confrontations between gangs, as a result of which respect and supremacy can be gained.

docs.title: Conduct and information
docs.text:
• The duration of a war is 30 minutes, and the maximum number of wars that can take place per day in a gang is 4.
  • Throughout a war, gang members have the duty to kill as many opponents as possible or to dominate the area to fulfill their goal, that of winning the territory they are fighting for.
  • Each war takes place in a different virtual world than the one in which the other players are located so that the wars are not influenced.
  • Gangsters manage to annihilate their opponents using weapons such as: Desert Eagle (Deagle), M4, AK47, Rifle, TEC-9 and Combat Shotgun.
  • Once they enter the war territory with the gang car they come from, gangsters have 10 seconds to position their cars favorably, and after these 10 seconds they will be automatically taken out of the vehicle if they have not already gotten out.
  • Also, once on the turf, a gangster can no longer enter a vehicle under any circumstances.
  • A 30-minute war takes place over 15 rounds.
  • Once a gangster leaves the turf, they will still be considered on the turf for a few seconds.
  • For a gang to win the war, they must dominate at least 8 rounds.
  • To win a round, the gang must obtain a higher score than the other in the current round.
  • If both gangs manage to obtain an equal score, the gang defending the territory will win the round.
  • At the end of each war, the score of the best gangster on the winning team and the weakest player on the losing team is calculated.
  • Wars take place on B-Zone RPG servers every Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday and Friday between 20:00-22:00. During summer, wars are held in an interval established following a poll on the website.
  • When a gang has a war, members of the respective gangs will see on the game map the territory for which the war is held, oscillating between the color of the offensive gang and the color of the defensive gang (to view territories use the /turfs command).
  • During the war, only personal vehicles or vehicles owned by the mafia can be used.
    • Exception: Journey, Mr.Whoopee, Coach, Hotdog, Packer, Bus, DFT-30, Dune, Tanker, Petrol Trailer/Article Trailer, Trashmaster, Barracks, Roadtrain, Linerunner, Flatbed and Enforcer.
  • Each gang has the obligation to listen to the instructions of the leader and sub-leaders of the faction.

docs.title: Weapon distribution
docs.text:
• Gangsters are required to have the Arms Dealer job when they have an active war.
  • Gangsters are required to provide weapons to teammates upon request.
  • To sell weapons, use the /sellgun command.
  • For the sale of weapons to be possible, gangsters need materials.
  • There is the /fput materials and /fget materials commands for controlling the gang's materials safe.
  • Find out more details about materials by accessing the Arms Dealer job page.

docs.title: Weapons by rank
docs.text:
Weapon packages by rank
  • Rank 1: Available command is /order 1 and offers the Deagle weapon.
  • Rank 2: Available command is /order 2 and offers Deagle and M4 weapons.
  • Rank 3: Available command is /order 3 and offers Deagle, M4 and Rifle weapons.
  • Rank 4: Available command is /order 4 and offers Deagle, M4, Tec9, Combat Shotgun and Rifle weapons.

Note: The /order command is only accessible inside the HQ, house and clan HQ.

docs.title: Drugs
docs.text:
In case a gangster runs out of health, they can use drugs to recover it. Depending on their importance, drugs are classified as follows:

  • Marijuana - using the command /usedrugs marijuana will consume 12 grams from the total drugs held. This drug gives the gangster 5 HP, but also 2% addiction or side effects such as dizziness.
  • Cocaine - A player can use this drug by typing the command /usedrugs cocaine. It will consume 18 grams from the total drugs held, they will receive 20 HP, but also 4% addiction or side effects such as dizziness.
  • Ecstasy - This drug can be used using the command /usedrugs ecstasy. 26 grams from the total drugs held will be consumed, and the player will receive 50 HP. Unlike other drugs, this offers 10% addiction and an unusual side effect. Once this drug is used, the character will automatically fall to the ground for 10 seconds. During this time the /stopanim command is useless.
  • Meth or methamphetamine - This drug is the most powerful, but also the most useful due to the consequences. Using the command /usedrugs meth, 38 grams of drugs will be consumed. The player will receive 100% HP, but also 20% addiction and the inability to move for 20 seconds.

Note 1: There is the /fput drugs and /fget drugs commands for controlling the gang's drug safe.

Note 2: This addiction can be reduced at the Los Santos city hospital using the /rehab command.

Note 3: Find out more details by accessing the Drugs page.

docs.title: Top Gangs
docs.text:
• Monthly turfs will be reset on the last Saturday of that month and the first two gangs with the most territories will be rewarded with gold, as follows:
    • 1st place will receive 10440 Gold which will be automatically distributed to all rank 1-6 members in the faction, including the leader.
    • 2nd place will receive 7800 Gold which will be distributed the same way.
  • In case of a tie, the tiebreaker will be made based on the number of wars won, and if it's still a tie, the winner will be chosen randomly.

docs.title: /order
docs.text:
The command is used by server gangsters to order a certain weapon package (weapon packages are available depending on the gangster's rank). A single parameter is used to complete the command, the ID of the weapon package.

Note: There are a total of 4 weapon packages. Usage example: /order 2.

docs.title: /turfs
docs.text: This command is available to all RPG server players, but is most often used by gangsters. The command itself displays both on the mini-radar and on the entire map from the game menu (ESC-MAP), the territories colored according to the color of the gang that holds it. During wars between gangsters, using the /turfs command shows the involved gangsters as points on the map, colored according to the team they belong to.

docs.title: /fvr
docs.text: Using the command has the effect of respawning unoccupied faction vehicles. It is a command extremely used during wars.

docs.title: /f
docs.text:
The command sends a message to the chat of the faction you belong to (only if you belong to one). The command is present in all factions except police departments where /r is used.

Example: "/f message"

docs.title: Conduct and information
docs.text:
• This type of war takes place every Saturday, between 20:00-21:00, the territory is located outside the cities1 and has the color of the winning gang.
  • Members located on the deathmatch territory are locked inside it and cannot leave it.
  • Respawning will take place directly on the territory, at a random position chosen by the server.
  • In the case of this type of war, the main objective is to obtain as many kills as possible, deaths being insignificant in declaring the winning gang. Therefore, the gang that will win the territory will be the one whose members add up the highest number of kills.
  • Also, the best member in the war (best) will be the one with the most kills, and the weakest member in the war (worst) will be the one with the fewest kills
  • After the war ends, all members are respawned, and 10 seconds later the war statistics will be displayed in table form2.
  • Members of the winning gang will be rewarded with a new countable achievement, which can be obtained with each victory of this type.

docs.title: Conduct and information
docs.text:
• This type of war takes place every Sunday, between 20:00-21:00, the territory is located outside the cities and has the shape of a tricolor, displaying the colors of the 3 gangs that formed the winning alliance.
  • Alliances are formed completely randomly when the war starts, forming 3 alliances of 3 gangs each.
  • Participating members in this type of war can leave the territory, but cannot cause damage to other gangsters outside of it or from outside of it.
  • Each alliance has its respawn points outside the territory, at opposite corners and equal distances.
  • In the case of this type of war, the main objective is to obtain as many kills as possible, having as few deaths as possible, all statistics resulting from dividing the number of kills by the number of deaths (called KDR).
  • The winning alliance is the one that has the highest arithmetic mean of KDR, therefore all gangs in the alliance must have the best possible scores, because a weak KDR of one gang will drag down the entire alliance.
  • Gangs in the same alliance can communicate with each other using the /gc command.
  • Gang leaders can change the minimum rank required to use the /gc command by using the /setgc command.
  • After the war ends, all members are respawned, and 10 seconds later the war statistics will be displayed in table form.
  • Members of the gangs in the winning alliance will be rewarded with a new countable achievement, which can be obtained with each victory of this type.

docs.title: Generalities
docs.text:
• A new title called "best killstreak" has been added, which will be held by the gangster who manages to kill the most opponents without being killed.
  • During wars, gangsters will view various statistics in the bottom-right of the screen, updated in real time.
  • To reach the special territory, you will proceed as in the case of normal wars (by leaving the HQ), at which point you will have to choose between leaving outside the HQ as usual, or being teleported to the war location.
  • These types of wars take place over a duration of 60 minutes.
  • Every time a gangster dies on the territory, they will be placed as a spectator on the player who killed them for 10 seconds and only then respawned.
  • When you enter the war, allies and opponents will be presented to you through chat messages.
  • Allies (those you cannot damage) will be displayed on the radar in green, and enemies in red.
  • This type of war uses free weapons, which you can obtain using the /guns command (through successive dialogues you will choose the main weapon and secondary weapon). Also, at each respawn you will receive the last two selected weapons.
  • Both types of wars are OPTIONAL, members are not required to participate, they are devoid of any type of vehicles and take place in a unique virtual-world.
  • If for various reasons a war is interrupted (unfinished), its statistics will be deleted.

docs.title: Weapon distribution
docs.text:
• Unlike classic wars, where weapons are ordered at HQ through the /order command, in supremacy wars, weapons are obtained using the /guns command, which once activated will generate successive dialogues through which the player can choose the first and second weapon (primary & secondary).
  • After death, the player will be respawned with the last two weapons ordered using the /guns command.
  • To change weapons, the player can activate the /guns command and choose the new weapons through the same type of successive dialogue.

docs.title: /turfs
docs.text: This command is available to all RPG server players, but is most often used by gangsters. The command itself displays both on the mini-radar and on the entire map from the game menu (ESC-MAP), the territories colored according to the color of the gang that holds it. During wars between gangsters, using the /turfs command shows the involved gangsters as points on the map, colored according to the team they belong to.

docs.title: /fvr
docs.text: Using the command has the effect of respawning unoccupied faction vehicles. It is a command extremely used during wars.

docs.title: /f
docs.text:
The command sends a message to the chat of the faction you belong to (only if you belong to one). The command is present in all factions except police departments where /r is used.

Example: "/f message"

docs.title: /guns
docs.text: The command generates a successive dialogue through which players can order weapons (in turn, primary and secondary) during supremacy wars.

docs.title: /score
docs.text: Using the /score command you can obtain a list of gang statistics, ordered in descending order.

docs.title: /top
docs.text: The /top command will display the names of the gangs that hold the territories for the 2 new types of wars.

docs.title: /leavewar
docs.text: To leave the war round you can use this command, but for 3 minutes you will not be able to re-enter.

docs.title: External links
docs.text: Wars page

docs.title: Buy Gold
docs.text: The main source of obtaining gold (the premium currency of the B-Zone RPG server) is represented by RPG Website.

docs.title: How to buy gold?
docs.text:
1. Log in to your account directly on the RPG website and click on the shopping cart icon.
  2. In the next window, add the billing information (click on the blue Manage Billing Information button), as they are necessary for billing.
    • Note: This needs to be done only once, after you have added the data, it is no longer necessary to do this for the next orders because they remain saved.
  3. After saving the billing data, go back and click on the yellow Buy Gold button.
  4. Click on the icon under the Gold package or packages you want to add them to the shopping cart. Adjust the desired quantity, the name of the player receiving the Gold, the name of the player (affiliate) you want to receive a free bonus from you if applicable, and select the desired payment method to finalize the payment and receive the Gold.
  5. Buy the desired products through the /shop command or go to the DealerShip /buyvehicle.
  6. Enjoy your purchases!

docs.title: Cash Money Packs
docs.text:
You can become an important, rich person who attracts a lot of attention in just a few simple steps. The B-Zone community shop (/shop) makes you rich!

Note

Learn how you can buy gold by following the steps on this page.

Warning

The gold prices presented on this page are standard. It is possible that in-game products may be cheaper if you make the purchase during a discount period.

docs.title: Available Money Packs
docs.text:
Currently, the server has ten packages of this type with different prices and values:

  • $35.500 Cash Money - 200 Gold
  • $108.000 Cash Money - 600 Gold
  • $182.500 Cash Money - 1000 Gold
  • $370.000 Cash Money - 2000 Gold
  • $562.500 Cash Money - 3000 Gold
  • $760.000 Cash Money - 4000 Gold
  • $1.155.000 Cash Money - 6000 Gold
  • $1.560.000 Cash Money - 8000 Gold
  • $1.975.000 Cash Money - 10.000 Gold
  • $4.000.000 Cash Money - 20.000 Gold

Upon purchasing such a package, you will immediately receive the money.

docs.title: How to Buy?
docs.text:
Follow these steps:

  1. Access the community shop using the /shop command.
  2. Select from the displayed list an item whose name follows this model: amount of money Cash Money - price Gold.
  3. The server will display some information about the purchase you are about to make.
  4. After reading the information, if everything is in order, press the Order button.
  5. Congratulations! You are now richer.

docs.title: Change Nickname
docs.text:
Do you need a new identity? The community shop is always at your disposal (/shop).

Note

Learn how you can buy gold by following the steps on this page.

Warning

The gold prices presented on this page are standard. It is possible that in-game products may be cheaper if you make the purchase during a discount period.

docs.title: Price
docs.text: • The price of changing the name is 600 Gold.

docs.title: How to Buy?
docs.text:
Follow these steps:

  1. Access the community shop using the /shop command.
  2. Select the following item from the displayed list: Change nickname - 600 Gold.
  3. The server will display some information about the name change process.
  4. After reading the information, press the Order button.
  5. Immediately after pressing the Order button, the server will display a box where you need to type the new name and press the Ok button.
  6. Congratulations! You now have a new identity in-game.

Remember

  • On the server's website, the history will remain undeleted, the old name remaining in the log.
  • Using vulgar names is punishable by admins with a permanent ban.

docs.title: Change Sex
docs.text:
B-Zone emphasizes reality and tries to bring reality into the game. In the real world, there are many examples of people who have changed their sex. Sex change is possible nowadays and as written above, B-Zone brings reality to you, so in-game on the community shop list (/shop) there is the possibility to change your sex.

Note

Learn how you can buy gold by following the steps on this page.

Warning

The gold prices presented on this page are standard. It is possible that in-game products may be cheaper if you make the purchase during a discount period.

docs.title: Price and Duration
docs.text:
• The price of sex change is 600 gold and can be purchased from the community shop (/shop).
  • The sex change is permanent and irreversible, but you can return to the initial sex by purchasing another change.

docs.title: How to Buy?
docs.text:
Follow these steps:

  1. Access the community shop using the /shop command.
  2. Select the following item from the displayed list: Change sex - 600 Gold.
  3. The server will display some information about the sex change process.
  4. After reading the information, press the Order button.
  5. Immediately after pressing the Order button, your sex will be changed from the current one to the opposite.
  6. Congratulations! You can now use boy or girl skins (/clothes), as applicable.

docs.title: Clan Color
docs.text: Free Change Paid Change

docs.title: General Information
docs.text:
Warning

The gold prices presented on this page are standard. It is possible that in-game products may be cheaper if you make the purchase during a discount period.

The Clan Color option from /shop allows changing the specific color of the clan.

The specific color is found in the TAG and clan name: at the player's name, on the HQ wall, on the wall of owned territories.

The standard price for changing the clan color is 400 Gold.

The first color change for clans is free and is done through the /clancolor command, where you will need to enter a HEX code for the desired color. You will also see a color preview and a confirmation message before the color changes.

You can find a bunch of websites by simply searching Google for "hex picker". If you don't want to manually search for such sites, you can go directly here: HTML Color Picker

  • You will then need to choose the desired color by clicking on it.
  • On the right side you will then see a preview of the selected color, as well as the HEX code. In our case, the HEX code is 3399FF for blue.
  • Now that you have the HEX code, you can use the /clancolor 3399FF command in-game to change the color.

Warning

For the HEX code to work in-game, you must always write it in CAPITAL LETTERS.

docs.title: How to Buy?
docs.text:
Follow these steps:

  1. Clan Color purchase is made directly from the /clancolor command.
  2. Use the above instructions to select the desired color and confirm the change by pressing the Yes button.
  3. Congratulations! You have now changed the clan color.

docs.title: Clan HQ Claim
docs.text: Clan information HQ Claim purchase from /shop Vacant HQ Occupied HQ Clan HQ Map

docs.title: General Information
docs.text:
Warning

The gold prices presented on this page are standard. It is possible that in-game products may be cheaper if you make the purchase during a discount period.

The HQ Claim option from /shop allows changing the current clan HQ with a new desired clan HQ.

On our server, there is a vast number of Clan HQs that can be claimed, a total of 71 HQs.

The standard price for changing the clan HQ is 600 Gold.

To be able to buy HQ Claims, you must be the owner of a clan of at least level 5.

The first time the clan reaches level 5, you will receive a free HQ Claim from the server. Subsequent HQ changes will need to be purchased from /shop.

Using the /claninfo command you will be able to see how many HQ Claims you have available.

docs.title: Usage
docs.text:
• The clan owner can claim an available clan HQ on the map using the /claimhq command at the HQ entrance.
  • After using the above command, the HQ will come into the clan's possession.

docs.title: How to Buy?
docs.text:
Follow these steps:

  1. Access the community shop using the /shop command.
  2. Select from the displayed list an item whose name follows this model: HQ Claim - price Gold.
  3. You will then receive a confirmation dialog that you want to purchase this product.
  4. If you confirm and click the Order button, you will receive 1 HQ Claim.
  5. Congratulations! You now have the possibility to change your clan HQ.

docs.title: Clan HQ Interior
docs.text: Clan information HQ Interior purchase from shop Select new Interior Confirm new Interior

docs.title: General Information
docs.text:
Warning

The gold prices presented on this page are standard. It is possible that in-game products may be cheaper if you make the purchase during a discount period.

The Clan HQ Interior option from /shop allows changing the current clan interior with a new predefined interior.

The standard price for changing the clan HQ interior is 600 Gold.

To be able to modify the HQ interior, you must be the owner of a clan of at least level 7.

At clan level 7, you will automatically receive 1 Free Clan HQ Interior with which you can modify the interior. Other Clan HQ Interiors will need to be purchased from /shop.

Depending on the clan level, you can only select certain available interiors.

If you want images of certain interiors, you can access this link.

Using the /claninfo command you will be able to see how many Clan HQ Interiors you have available.

docs.title: Usage
docs.text:
• The clan owner can modify the HQ interior starting from clan level 7, positioning themselves in front of the HQ and using the /interiorhq command.
  • Using the above command will open a dialog to select the new HQ, where you will see a list of predefined interiors.
  • The number of interiors increases as the clan level is higher and unlocks new interiors.
  • The owner then selects one of the desired interiors and will receive a confirmation dialog.
  • Confirming through the Yes button will automatically modify the HQ interior.

docs.title: How to Buy?
docs.text:
Follow these steps:

  1. Access the community shop using the /shop command.
  2. Select from the displayed list an item whose name follows this model: Clan HQ Interior - price Gold.
  3. You will then receive a confirmation dialog that you want to purchase this product.
  4. If you confirm and click the Order button, you will receive 1 Clan HQ Interior.
  5. Congratulations! You now have the possibility to change your clan HQ interior.

docs.title: Clan Name and Tag
docs.text: Confirmation dialog Select new name Select new TAG

docs.title: General Information
docs.text:
Warning

The gold prices presented on this page are standard. It is possible that in-game products may be cheaper if you make the purchase during a discount period.

The Clan Name+Tag Change option from /shop allows changing the name and TAG of the clan.

The standard price for changing the clan name and tag is 600 Gold.

When changing the clan name and tag, make sure you choose a decent name and tag allowed by the regulations. Clans that put random, vulgar names/tags, etc. will be renamed by staff or even deleted without any prior warning.

The clan name must be between a minimum of 1 and a maximum of 22 characters.

The clan TAG must be between a minimum of 1 and a maximum of 4 characters.

docs.title: How to Buy?
docs.text:
Follow these steps:

  1. Access the community shop using the /shop command.
  2. Select from the displayed list an item whose name follows this model: Clan Name+Tag Change - price Gold.
  3. You will then receive a confirmation dialog that you want to purchase this product.
  4. In the next dialog, you will need to enter the new clan name following the information mentioned above.
  5. In the last dialog, you will need to enter the new clan TAG following the information mentioned above.
  6. Congratulations! You have now changed the clan name and tag.

Warning

The new clan TAG must contain strictly the letters that make up this TAG. Square brackets are added automatically by the server, you don't need to add them.

docs.title: Clans
docs.text:
B-Zone servers host a considerable number of players, which is why they group together and form teams of friends. Why not be even closer to each other? You have an ingenious system at your disposal to create your own group under a name and tag chosen by you, the clan. In the clan, there are a multitude of activities and most importantly, anyone can have their own clan. Follow the details below and you will learn more.

Note

Learn how you can buy gold by following the steps on this page.

Warning

The gold prices presented on this page are standard. It is possible that in-game products may be cheaper if you make the purchase during a discount period.

docs.title: Benefit Period
docs.text:
Currently, the servers have 4 clan packages with different prices and slots:

  • Small clan with 15 slots (30 days) - 2000 Gold
  • Medium clan with 25 slots (30 days) - 3000 Gold
  • Big clan with 50 slots (30 days) - 4000 Gold
  • Mega clan with 75 slots (30 days) - 5500 Gold

Upon purchasing such a package, you will be kicked by the server for synchronization to take place.

docs.title: Benefits
docs.text:
• A clan represents an open place where you can socialize and make new friends.
  • The clan is somewhat similar to a faction, thus helping with better server integration and understanding.
  • After creating the clan in-game, you have the right to request a special section on the forum, thus becoming more known.
  • There is a quite attractive system that has territories for clans as stakes, thus wars between clans appear.
  • Clans that meet certain conditions can win a certain amount of gold.
  • The clan owner can distribute to their members a certain amount of gold won within the clan.
  • The clan owner can rename rank names at any time.

docs.title: Characteristics
docs.text:
• After the clan benefit period expires, the owner has 30 days to renew the clan.
  • If 30 days of inactivity are reached (without renewal), the clan is automatically disbanded in-game, and the clan's forum section is moved from official clans to unofficial clans.
  • The owner can disband the clan at any time or transfer it to another player.

docs.title: How to Buy?
docs.text:
In just a few simple steps, you will get your own clan:

  1. Access the community shop using the /shop command.
  2. Select one of the following items from the displayed list:
    • Small clan(30 Days) - 2000 Gold
    • Medium clan(30 Days) - 3000 Gold
    • Big clan(30 Days) - 4000 Gold
    • Mega clan(30 Days) - 5500 Gold
  3. The server will display some information about what you need to do to get the clan.
  4. After reading the information, press the Order button.
  5. Upon pressing the Order button, there are two purchase possibilities:
    • If you don't have a clan at that moment, the server will ask you to enter the clan name, followed by the clan tag without entering the two brackets ([TAG]).
      • As soon as you have entered all the necessary information, the server will ask you to re-log.
      • After re-logging, your clan will be active and you can use it.
    • If you already own a clan, the server will offer you information about renewing it. If the selected package contains the same number of slots as the current clan, then the clan's activity period will be increased by 30 days. If the selected package contains a different number of slots, then the clan will expire after 30 days from renewal and the number of slots will be increased or decreased accordingly.
  6. After creating a clan, you are requested to contact one of the forum administrators to create your special section within the official clans.

docs.title: Clear Faction Punish
docs.text:
If you need to join a certain faction with your friends, but the punishment from the last faction (Faction Punish) doesn't allow it, then quickly access the B-Zone community shop and get rid of this unpleasant incident.

Note

Learn how you can buy gold by following the steps on this page.

Warning

The gold prices presented on this page are standard. It is possible that in-game products may be cheaper if you make the purchase during a discount period.

docs.title: Price
docs.text:
• The price of clearing 10 FP (Faction Punish) points costs 200 gold.
  • If you have less than 10 FP points, you will still be charged 200 gold.

Note

If for example you buy Clear 10 FP when you have 0 FP, it will be set to -10, so the money is not lost.

docs.title: How to Buy?
docs.text:
Follow these steps:

  1. Access the community shop using the /shop command.
  2. Select the following item from the displayed list: Clear 10 FP - 200 Gold.
  3. The server will display some information about the purchase you are about to make.
  4. After reading the information, if everything is in order, press the Order button.
  5. Congratulations! The purchase was successful.

docs.title: Clear Warn
docs.text:
Are you upset that other players no longer trust you because you received warnings (warns) from the RPG server administrators? No problem, open the community shop (/shop) and get rid of unwanted warnings in a few simple steps.

Note

Learn how you can buy gold by following the steps on this page.

Warning

The gold prices presented on this page are standard. It is possible that in-game products may be cheaper if you make the purchase during a discount period.

docs.title: Duration and Price
docs.text:
• The price of clearing one warning received from administrators costs 400 gold.
  • Once the payment is made, one warning will be deleted from the game, but its traces (history/log on the website) will remain.

docs.title: How to Buy?
docs.text:
Follow these steps:

  1. Access the community shop using the /shop command.
  2. Select the following item from the displayed list: Clear 1 warn - 400 Gold.
  3. The server will display some information about the warning clearing process.
  4. After reading the information, press the Order button.
  5. Immediately after pressing the Order button, the server will delete one warning from your account.
  6. Congratulations! Players may trust you again.

Note

The log/history on the website will remain unchanged, even if you purchase this product.

docs.title: Discounts
docs.text:
Each item purchasable using the premium currency, gold, has a standard price, but there are periods of time when these items are cheaper than the preset price.

Usually, discounts appear when various important events take place, such as Christmas, Easter, or the beginning of a new season. Each time such actions take place, community members are informed through an announcement published on the main web page, www.b-zone.ro or on the community's official facebook page.

By selecting an announcement related to discounts, you will be redirected to a page specially created in the announcements category on the forum. The forum page you will be redirected to will include a list of all items that benefit from discounts. Also, the period during which you can benefit from discounts will be specified there.

docs.title: Extra Favorite Slot
docs.text:
An Extra Favorite Vehicle Slot (Extra Favorite Slot) represents the player's ability to purchase one more slot for the favorite vehicles list.

Such a slot can be added to your garage for the amount of 300 Gold per slot.

docs.title: How to Buy It?
docs.text:
Follow these steps:

  1. Access the community shop using the /shop command.
  2. Select from the displayed list an item whose name follows this model: Extra Favorite Slot - price Gold.
  3. You will then receive a confirmation dialog that you want to purchase this product.
  4. If you confirm and click the Order button, you will receive 1 Extra Slot in the favorite vehicles list.
  5. Congratulations! You can now add another vehicle to the list.

docs.title: Extra Vehicle Slot
docs.text:
Each player's garage is limited to a maximum of 4 slots, which means that only 4 vehicles can fit in the garage. If you need even more vehicles, expand your garage. The B-Zone community shop helps you expand it, type the /shop command!

Note

Learn how you can buy gold by following the steps on this page.

Warning

The gold prices presented on this page are standard. It is possible that in-game products may be cheaper if you make the purchase during a discount period.

docs.title: Duration and Price
docs.text:
• The price of expanding your own garage with one more slot costs 800 gold.
  • Once a new slot is purchased, it will remain with you permanently.

docs.title: How to Buy?
docs.text:
Follow these steps:

  1. Access the community shop using the /shop command.
  2. Select the following item from the displayed list: Extra vehicle slot - 800 Gold.
  3. The server will display some information about the slot purchase process.
  4. After reading the information, press the Order button.
  5. Immediately after pressing the Order button, your garage will receive an additional slot.
  6. Congratulations! You can buy more vehicles.

docs.title: Garage
docs.text:
Garages available on /shop Garage entrance Garage interior Cars in garage on /v

Players who own a house can add a special garage from the shop with Gold to house their beloved vehicles.

Warning

The gold prices presented on this page are standard. It is possible that in-game products may be cheaper if you make the purchase during a discount period.

docs.title: General Characteristics
docs.text:
• Only a player who owns a house can buy a garage in the vicinity of their house (40 units).
  • At the time of purchase, the garage position for entrance/exit will be the same position as the location where you are, so choose the position carefully.
    • If you made a mistake with the position, there is no editing option. You will need to repurchase a garage to change the position.
  • There are a total of 3 types of garages (see price list).
  • Only small or medium-sized personal vehicles can be parked in the garage. Vehicles that are too large cannot be parked there.
  • The garage allows repairing a damaged vehicle directly from it for the amount of $200.
  • To park a vehicle in the garage, go with it in front of the garage and use the /enter command.
  • To select a vehicle from the garage, enter it by pressing F or /enter while on foot, then after selecting the vehicle you can use the Take button.
  • To leave the garage without taking any vehicle, you can use the Leave button.
  • To completely remove a vehicle from the garage, you can use the Remove button.
  • When selling the house, the garage will disappear.

docs.title: Price
docs.text:
The price of a garage differs depending on its size, as follows:

  • Small garage (4 slots): 1000 Gold
  • Medium garage (8 slots): 1600 Gold
  • Big garage (12 slots): 2400 Gold

docs.title: How to Buy?
docs.text:
Follow these steps:

  1. Access the community shop using the /shop command.
  2. Select one of the desired garages from the displayed list: Small Garage (4 slots), Medium Garage (8 slots), Big Garage (12 slots).
  3. The server will display some information about the garage addition process that we ask you to read carefully because the garage can no longer be moved once you have placed it.
  4. After reading the information, press the Order button.
  5. Immediately after pressing the Order button, the garage will be created at the position where you are.
  6. Congratulations! You can now enjoy your new garage.

docs.title: Gold Vehicles
docs.text:
Premium Dealership Interface
  • Below you will find a list of all B-Zone RPG server vehicles that can be purchased from the DealerShip using Gold.
  • Vehicles purchased with Gold from the DealerShip cannot be sold to other players, only returned to the DealerShip.
  • The refund value for vehicles purchased with Gold is listed for each vehicle below and represents 40% of their value.
  • You don't need a premium account if you opt to buy such a vehicle, only for premium vehicles.
  • Learn how you can buy Gold by following the steps on the Buy Gold page.

docs.title: Gold Cars
docs.text: For a complete list of Gold vehicles available at the DealerShip, including their prices and technical specifications, please check in-game using the /buyvehicle command or visit the premium DealerShip.

docs.title: Examples of available vehicles:
docs.text:
• Buffalo - 2.149 Gold
  • Premier - 299 Gold
  • Sabre - 1.699 Gold
  • Comet - 1.949 Gold
  • Sandking - 1.599 Gold
  • Super GT - 1.899 Gold
  • Feltzer - 999 Gold
  • Jester - 1.799 Gold
  • Sultan - 2.199 Gold
  • Elegy - 2.099 Gold
  • Cheetah - 2.299 Gold
  • Bullet - 2.849 Gold
  • Infernus - 2.999 Gold
  • Turismo - 2.499 Gold
  • Banshee - 2.599 Gold
  • Monster Truck - 3.799 Gold
  • Hotring - 3.799 Gold

docs.title: Gold Bicycles/Motorcycles
docs.text:
• Freeway - 649 Gold
  • FCR-900 - 899 Gold
  • NRG-500 - 1.899 Gold

docs.title: Gold Helicopters
docs.text:
• Sparrow - 2.399 Gold
  • Maverick - 4.999 Gold

docs.title: Legend
docs.text:
• Dealership Price (Gold) - the price of the good purchased with Gold in the DealerShip from the shop.
  • Dealership Gold refund - The amount of money you receive if you sell your car to the DealerShip (/v -> vehicle -> sell).
  • Maximum speed - The maximum speed the vehicle can reach.
  • Based on - Names of real cars associated by similarity with those in San Andreas.
  • Number of seats - The maximum number of players that can enter the vehicle at the same time (including the driver).
  • Price in Gold - Represents the amount of Gold needed to purchase the vehicle.
  • Tunable - If the vehicle is tunable, the name of the tuning it belongs to is displayed, otherwise the message "Not tunable" is displayed.

docs.title: Hidden Color
docs.text:
If you want a shiny vehicle with a special color, different from everyone else's, then you need to buy a set of hidden colors for your vehicle.

Note

Learn how you can buy gold by following the steps on this page.

Warning

The gold prices presented on this page are standard. It is possible that in-game products may be cheaper if you make the purchase during a discount period.

docs.title: Price and Duration
docs.text:
• The price of a set of two colors (primary and secondary) costs 600 gold (see /shop).
  • Once the two colors are purchased, they will remain usable for your vehicle forever, but if you want to sell the vehicle to another player, the color set will disappear.

docs.title: How to Buy?
docs.text:
In just a few simple steps, your vehicle can have such a color set:

  1. Access the community shop using the /shop command.
  2. Select the following item from the displayed list: Hidden color - 600 Gold.
  3. The server will display some information about what you need to do to get the color set.
  4. After reading the information, press the Order button.
  5. If you have an active red checkpoint on the map, the server will abandon your order, requiring you to use the /cancel checkpoint command to cancel it. Once the checkpoint is canceled, follow the steps from the beginning.
  6. The server will set a red checkpoint on the map, you need to get there with the vehicle you want to install the color set on.
  7. If you canceled the red checkpoint provided by the Order button, don't worry. Type the /hiddencolor command and the checkpoint will appear again.
  8. To enter the hidden color selection menu, you must type the /hiddencolor command while being near the CarColor business.
  9. After finishing the selection of the two hidden colors, press the Buy Color button.
  10. Congratulations! You have a nicer vehicle.

docs.title: House Interiors
docs.text:
Beautify your own home and become the most envied neighbor. The B-Zone community shop (/shop) provides you with approximately 40 different types of interiors that you can purchase for your house.

Note

Learn how you can buy gold by following the steps on this page.

Warning

The gold prices presented on this page are standard. It is possible that in-game products may be cheaper if you make the purchase during a discount period.

docs.title: Price and Duration
docs.text:
There are three types of packages:

  • Small interior - 1400 Gold - There are 6 interiors of this type.
  • Medium interior - 2000 Gold - There are 24 interiors of this type.
  • Big interior - 2600 Gold - There are 10 interiors of this type.

The house interior is permanent, but is reset to the standard one when the house is sold to another player.

docs.title: Characteristics
docs.text:
• To be able to buy a new interior for the house, you must be outside it.
  • When you sell the house, the interior will be reset to the standard one.
  • All house tenants must reconnect to the server.

docs.title: How to Buy?
docs.text:
Follow these steps:

  1. Access the community shop using the /shop command.
  2. Select one of the following items from the displayed list:
    • Small house interior - 1400 Gold
    • Medium house interior - 2000 Gold
    • Big house interior - 2600 Gold
  3. The server will display some information about the house interior change process.
  4. After reading the information, if everything is in order, press the Order button.
  5. Immediately after pressing the Order button, the server will display a list of available interiors. Select one and press Select.
  6. Congratulations! You now have a new interior for your house.

Notes

  • If you somehow chose the wrong interior type, you have the Back button available to cancel the interior selection.
  • Once you have chosen an interior from the list and purchased it, the action is irrevocable, you can no longer cancel or modify it, so be careful.

docs.title: Small Interiors
docs.text: Interior 1 Interior 1 Interior 1 Interior 4 Interior 4 Interior 4 Interior 5 Interior 5 Interior 5 Interior 7 Interior 7 Interior 7 Interior 18 Interior 18 Interior 18

docs.title: Medium Interiors
docs.text: Interior 2 Interior 2 Interior 2 Interior 3 Interior 3 Interior 3 Interior 9 Interior 9 Interior 9 Interior 10 Interior 10 Interior 10 Interior 12 Interior 12 Interior 12 Interior 14 Interior 14 Interior 14 Interior 15 Interior 15 Interior 15 Interior 16 Interior 16 Interior 16 Interior 17 Interior 17 Interior 17 Interior 19 Interior 19 Interior 19 Interior 20 Interior 20 Interior 20 Interior 23 Interior 23 Interior 23 Interior 24 Interior 24 Interior 24 Interior 25 Interior 25 Interior 25 Interior 27 Interior 27 Interior 27 Interior 28 Interior 28 Interior 28 Interior 29 Interior 29 Interior 29 Interior 31 Interior 31 Interior 31 Interior 32 Interior 32 Interior 32 Interior 34 Interior 34 Interior 34 Interior 35 Interior 35 Interior 35 Interior 36 Interior 36 Interior 36 Interior 37 Interior 37 Interior 37 Interior 38 Interior 38 Interior 38

docs.title: Big Interiors
docs.text: Interior 6 Interior 6 Interior 6 Interior 8 Interior 8 Interior 8 Interior 11 Interior 11 Interior 11 Interior 13 Interior 13 Interior 13 Interior 21 Interior 21 Interior 21 Interior 22 Interior 22 Interior 22 Interior 30 Interior 30 Interior 30 Interior 33 Interior 33 Interior 33 Interior 39 Interior 39 Interior 39 Interior 40 Interior 40 Interior 40

docs.title: Marathon
docs.text: Marathon interface Claimed rewards Progress bar Complete option

docs.title: General Information
docs.text:
Warning

The gold prices presented on this page are standard. It is possible that in-game products may be cheaper if you make the purchase during a discount period.

The Marathon is an automatic event organized by staff and whose duration lasts a whole month.

Any player of at least level 1 is automatically registered and can participate in this event.

All event participants can win one reward for each day of the month if they manage to unlock them.

The marathon interface can be opened in-game using one of the commands /maraton or /marathon.

docs.title: About Rewards
docs.text:
• Players can see all the rewards for each day of the marathon, but the rewards can only be unlocked when that day of the month is reached.
  • To be able to claim a reward, you will need to collect the points necessary to unlock it.
  • The number of points required to unlock a reward differs depending on the importance of the rewards that day. Smaller rewards will require fewer points while larger rewards require more points.
  • If you didn't manage to collect the points necessary to unlock the reward from a certain day, you can continue to collect them the next day because the points remain.
  • Points collected extra for a day are automatically transferred to the next marathon day, they are not lost.
  • This means you can complete as many marathon days on any day of the month.
  • To be able to get all the rewards from the marathon, it is necessary to unlock all previous rewards. You cannot skip rewards from one day to take rewards from the following days.
  • Once you have unlocked a reward, you will see a CLAIM button next to it. You will only receive the rewards when you click the claim button.
  • The last available day on which you can claim rewards is usually day number 2 of the month after the marathon ends. Any unclaimed rewards by then will be lost.

docs.title: Progress
docs.text: • In the marathon interface, you will be able to see a progress bar showing which day you have reached in the marathon as well as your progress for that day.

docs.title: Obtaining Points
docs.text:
• Marathon points can be accumulated by doing different activities on the server.
  • Certain actions offer a maximum number of points that you can achieve in a day to prevent possible abuse.
  • To be able to see which actions offer points and how many points they offer, you can click on the POINTS button in the marathon interface and you will see a table with the points.

docs.title: PRO Marathon
docs.text:
• The marathon runs two versions in parallel:
    • The STANDARD version is available to all players for free.
    • The PRO version can be unlocked for a fee. The price of the PRO version differs from season to season, so you will need to check in-game what its current price is.
  • The PRO version of the marathon offers players many more advantages compared to the STANDARD version, namely:
    • Higher value rewards.
    • The possibility to receive rewards from both versions simultaneously.
    • Even if the PRO version is unlocked late, there is still the possibility to receive the rewards from previous days as well, so no reward is lost.
    • Marathon progress is kept when the PRO version is unlocked.
  • The PRO version can be obtained from the marathon interface by clicking the GET PRO button.

docs.title: Complete Option
docs.text:
• The marathon also provides you with an option to finish the progress from your current day without having to collect points from different actions on the server.
  • This option is paid and usually costs 150 Gold, and its use is done by pressing the COMPLETE button in the marathon interface.
  • One of the advantages of this option is to help you on days that require too many points and you don't have enough time or if you want to recover lost marathon days.

Note

If certain aspects mentioned here differ from the current marathon season, these will be announced by staff on the community forum.

docs.title: Premium Account
docs.text:
We all start from the same statistics, but as you progress, if you want to have even more facilities on one of the B-Zone RPG servers, you need to purchase such a package that transforms your regular account into a premium one. To access the community's virtual shop, use the /shop command in-game.

Note

Learn how you can buy gold by following the steps on this page.

Warning

The gold prices presented on this page are standard. It is possible that in-game products may be cheaper if you make the purchase during a discount period.

docs.title: Benefit Period
docs.text:
Currently, the server has six packages of this type with different prices and durations:

  • One week [Trial] - Free
  • One week - 90 Gold
  • One month - 320 Gold
  • Three months - 840 Gold
  • Six months - 1600 Gold
  • One year - 3000 Gold

Upon purchasing such a package, the specific premium account features will be automatically made available to you.

You can also combine packages to increase the benefit duration, for example:

Purchasing the first two packages will cost you 410 Gold and you will have premium account facilities for a duration of one month and one week (37 days).

The Trial package can be purchased only once per account, representing the test period of Premium Account benefits.

Note

Premium Account can be obtained permanently through the bonus system existing on servers. For details, view the Bonus System.

docs.title: Premium Account Benefits
docs.text:
Why be a regular player? Look below at how many benefits the B-Zone community provides you if you purchase such a package:

  • The interest that the bank pays you at each payday will increase from 0.01 to 0.03.
  • You will receive a 25% higher salary at each payday compared to players without a premium account.
  • You will receive 50% more money from jobs.
  • Every five hours played you will receive a bonus:
    • One respect point
    • One rob point
    • One escape point
    • One accept point (for lawyers)
    • You will lose 1 FP (faction-punish) point
  • If you have more respect points than you need to type /buylevel, when typing this command, the respect points above the limit required for level advancement will remain, they won't be lost as in the case of players without a premium account.
  • You have the ability to buy and sell sport vehicles such as: Turismo, Bullet, Infernus, Cheetah, Banshee, Hotring, Hotring A and Hotring B.
  • The maximum limit of rob points you can have increases from 10 to 20.
  • The maximum limit of escape points you can have increases from 20 to 40.
  • The maximum limit of accept points you can have increases from 150 to 300.
  • You have the /mp3 command available to listen to any radio outside of vehicles.
  • You will be able to fuel a vehicle's tank up to 150% instead of 100%.
  • You will be able to compete with other players in races for a stake of up to $2000 instead of $1000 (/race).
  • The server will allow you to have up to 60 friends in your personal list (/friends).

docs.title: Private Frequency
docs.text:
Menu /myfreq Choosing a frequency

Keep in touch with friends much easier and support your friendships on the B-Zone RPG server through communication. Purchasing a private frequency gives you the ability to communicate with your friends in a safe place, where you have all the power, you decide who you want to stay on your frequency and who not, with options such as setting a password for the frequency, banning certain members from the frequency, or destroying the frequency if you get bored with it.

docs.title: Duration and Price
docs.text:
• The price of a private frequency is 299 gold.
  • Once purchased, a private frequency will be valid for 31 days.
  • You can extend the lifetime of the private frequency by purchasing the option from /shop once more, adding another 31 days to the initial duration.

Remember

The price is standard, discounts from certain periods do not apply to this product.

docs.title: /myfreq
docs.text:
This command displays a dialog where you can find details about your frequency, expiration date, and some frequency options such as setting a password, excluding a member from the frequency, excluding all members, or destroying the frequency.

Note

Immediately after purchasing a frequency, you must choose your frequency ID.

docs.title: /setfreq
docs.text:
Using this command you can set a frequency for your Walkie-Talkie.

Syntax: /setfreq (10.0 - 79.9 private, 80.0 - 109.9 public, 0 to turn off)

docs.title: /wt
docs.text:
Represents the abbreviation of the object through which you speak, walkie talkie (radio station). This can be purchased from a 24/7 store. The command only works if you have set a frequency for the walkie talkie using the /setfreq command.

Example: "/wt message"

Note

The command only works if you have at least level 5.

docs.title: How to Buy?
docs.text:
Follow these steps:

  1. Access the community shop using the /shop command.
  2. Select the Private frequency option from the displayed list.
  3. The server will display some information about the private frequency purchase process.
  4. After reading the information, press the Order button.
  5. Immediately after pressing the Order button, you will own a private frequency. To configure it, use the /myfreq command.
  6. Congratulations! You now have a frequency just for you and your friends.

Note

Learn how you can buy gold by following the steps on this page.

docs.title: Useful Commands
docs.text:
Interface /shop

This category of commands uses exclusively the server's real currency (gold), so please use them carefully to avoid unwanted situations.

docs.title: /shop
docs.text:
Any player can use this command to open the B-Zone community's virtual shop (see shop in image), on the RPG server. The shop consists of a dialog with rows presenting information in the following model:

  • Product name - Amount of gold required for purchase

The dialog title contains the amount of gold you have at that moment. If you have enough gold to buy a certain product from the shop, the product's price will be colored green, otherwise red.

docs.title: /hiddencolor
docs.text: The command can only be used near the "CarColor" business and has the effect of teleporting the car to the color selection menu. There you can select special colors for your vehicle using gold, colors that cannot be accessed by simply typing the /carcolor command. The color selection menu is welcoming and extremely easy to use.

docs.title: Vehicle 3D Text
docs.text:
Vehicle with 3D Text

A 3D text represents text that can be viewed by all players within a certain radius from any angle as long as it is on their screen.

Such text can be added to your own vehicle in exchange for the amount of 600 Gold.

Warning

The gold prices presented on this page are standard. It is possible that in-game products may be cheaper if you make the purchase during a discount period.

This 3D text is attached to the respective vehicle and behaves approximately like VIP text with some differences:

  • 3D text can be added to any owned vehicle, regardless of whether it is premium or not.
  • 3D text is dynamic, which means you can customize the text as you wish.
    • RPG B-ZONE
    • RPG B-ZONE COMMUNITY
  • 3D text gives you the possibility of using special characters.
    • 'RPG B-ZONE'
    • ``RPG B-ZONE``
  • 3D text cannot be styled.
    • Cannot be made bold, italic, underline, etc.
  • 3D text accepts a maximum of 60 characters in it.
  • 3D text can be positioned around the car within a radius of 10 positive units.
    • Negative values cannot be used for the number of units, the smallest value being 0.
  • 3D text appears/disappears with the vehicle (when spawned, destroyed, etc).

Just like VIP text, 3D text will also be lost when the vehicle is sold to another player and must be purchased again if desired.

docs.title: How to Add This 3D Text?
docs.text:
To add this 3D text, you need the amount of 600 Gold in your account at the time of purchase and to follow these steps:

  1. Use the /vehicles command
  2. Choose the desired vehicle.
  3. Choose the option 'Add 3D text on car'.

Once you confirm that you are sure of this purchase, the 3D text will be placed on the car, this being one preset by the server.

Also from the /vehicles command you will find 3 new options for modifying it, namely: text modification, color and position.

docs.title: Modifying Text/Color/Position
docs.text:
• To modify the text: choose the text modification option, then in the box that appears enter the text you want to be displayed.
  • To modify the color: choose the color modification option, then in the box that appears enter an RGB color code, you can use this site for choosing the color (Color Picker).
  • To modify the position: choose the position modification option, then from the displayed dialog choose the coordinate axis you want to modify (X / Y / Z).
    • Once the coordinate axis is chosen, you must enter a value between 0 (preset position) and 10 (maximum allowed distance from the preset position).
  • For texts in multiple colors: choose the text modification option, then in the box that appears enter the text together with the desired color codes in the following format:
    • {FF0000}B-Zone {00FF00}Community
    • The desired color code is always entered between braces.

docs.title: Vehicle Age
docs.text:
To increase the value of your vehicle and to increase your chances of someone being attracted to it and buying it at a higher price than the DealerShip, it must have something special. Buy extra days for your vehicle and it will become much more valuable! No one will know that you bought days for your vehicle, so it can remain a secret.

Note

Learn how you can buy gold by following the steps on this page.

Warning

The gold prices presented on this page are standard. It is possible that in-game products may be cheaper if you make the purchase during a discount period.

docs.title: Duration and Price
docs.text:
The price differs depending on how many days you want to buy for your vehicle:

  • + 30 days to vehicle age - 400 Gold
  • + 180 days to vehicle age - 2.000 Gold
  • + 365 days to vehicle age - 4.000 Gold

Once purchased, the days will be added to the total age of the vehicle and will remain with you permanently.

docs.title: How to Buy?
docs.text:
Follow these steps:

  1. Access your garage using the /vehicles command.
  2. Select one of the 3 packages above from the displayed list.
  3. The server will display some information about the process of purchasing days for the vehicle age.
  4. After reading the information, press the Order button.
  5. Immediately after pressing the Order button, the purchased days will be added to your vehicle's age.
  6. Congratulations! You now have a more valuable vehicle.

docs.title: Colored License Plate
docs.text:
Vehicle with Colored License Plate

A Colored License Plate represents the player's ability to set a desired color for the text on their license plate number.

Such a colored number can be added to your own vehicle in exchange for the amount of 300 Gold.

docs.title: Characteristics
docs.text:
The colored license plate has the following characteristics:

  • The colored license plate can be added to any owned vehicle, regardless of whether it is premium or not.
  • The colored license plate can have a single color, it cannot be colored in sections.
    • RPG B-ZONE
    • B-ZONE COMMUNITY
  • Special characters CANNOT be used in the colored license plate text.
  • The colored license plate cannot be styled.
    • Cannot be made bold, italic, underline, etc.
  • The colored license plate accepts a maximum of 10 characters in it.

Just like VIP text, the colored license plate will also be lost when the vehicle is sold to another player and must be purchased again if desired.

docs.title: How to Add a Colored License Plate?
docs.text:
To add a colored license plate, you need the amount of 300 Gold in your account at the time of purchase and to follow these steps:

  1. Use the /vehicles command
  2. Choose the desired vehicle.
  3. Choose the option 'Add colored license plate to car'.

Once you confirm that you are sure of this purchase, you will receive a preset color on the car's license plate number, this being one preset by the server.

Also from the /vehicles command you will find a new option for modifying it, namely 'Change License Plate'.

This option will display 3 other available options:

  • Edit License Plate: with which you can change the text on it.
  • Custom Color for Plate: with which you can choose a desired color for the license plate number in RRGGBB format
    • The desired color code is always entered between braces.
  • Default Color Palette for Plate: with which you can choose a plate color from a list of colors preset by the server.

docs.title: Vehicle KM Reset
docs.text:
To get rid of the multitude of kilometers traveled with your vehicle and to increase your chances of someone being attracted to it and buying it, you need a small technical adjustment. Reset your vehicle's mileage to 0 and it will become like new! No one will know that your vehicle is not new.

Note

Learn how you can buy gold by following the steps on this page.

Warning

The gold prices presented on this page are standard. It is possible that in-game products may be cheaper if you make the purchase during a discount period.

docs.title: Price
docs.text: • The price of resetting the mileage is 600 gold.

docs.title: How to Buy?
docs.text:
Follow these steps:

  1. Access the community shop using the /shop command.
  2. Select the following item from the displayed list: Vehicle KM Reset - 600 Gold.
  3. The server will display some information about the vehicle mileage reset process.
  4. After reading the information, press the Order button.
  5. Immediately after pressing the Order button, your vehicle's mileage will be reset to 0 kilometers traveled.
  6. Congratulations! You can now show your friends a car like new from the store.

docs.title: VIP Car
docs.text:
Convert to VIP vehicle Vehicle Menu VIP vehicle edit menu

Players can customize their vehicles as they wish. If you want a unique vehicle with a personalized text, then you have the possibility to convert your normal car into a VIP car.

Note

Learn how you can buy gold by following the steps on this page.

Warning

The gold prices presented on this page are standard. It is possible that in-game products may be cheaper if you make the purchase during a discount period.

docs.title: Price and Duration
docs.text:
• The price of converting a normal vehicle into a VIP vehicle costs 600 Gold (see /shop).
  • Once the vehicle is converted, it will remain VIP until it is sold to another player or to the dealership. Upon sale, the VIP status is lost and it becomes a normal vehicle again.

docs.title: Conversion
docs.text:
• Vehicle conversion is done from the vehicle menu (/v) by selecting the desired vehicle, then the Convert to VIP car option.
  • There is a limited number of vehicles that can be converted: Sultan, Cheetah, Turismo, Banshee, Bullet, Infernus, Hotring, Hotring A, Hotring B, Monster, Monster A, Monster B, Maverick, Packer, Stuntplane, Sparrow, Shamal, Dune, Flatbed, Raindance, Bus/Coach, Roadtrain, Leviathan, DFT-30 and Tractor.
  • VIP vehicles will appear in the vehicle menu with VIP status.
  • The text position on VIP vehicles is dynamic, the text can be placed anywhere the owner wants near the vehicle.
  • The system will allow you to modify the text and its color as many times as you want.

Note

Using vulgar or offensive text will be sanctioned by admins.

docs.title: How to Buy?
docs.text:
In just a few simple steps, your vehicle can become VIP:

  1. Access the vehicle menu using the /v command.
  2. Select a vehicle from the list that can be converted, then click on: Convert to VIP car (600 Gold).
  3. The server will display some information about VIP vehicles, namely that this status is lost when selling the vehicle.
  4. After reading the information, press the Yes button.
  5. Congratulations! You now have your first VIP vehicle.
  6. You can further modify the text itself and its color from the /v menu, selecting the VIP vehicle.

docs.title: Audio Plugin
docs.text:
• The community's samp servers feature certain radio stations that do not work if you do not have a special plugin installed. To get rid of this problem, access this link to download the plugin.
  • Before starting the plugin installation, make sure the GTA San Andreas game is closed.
  • Follow the installation instructions until the installation is complete.

Congratulations! You have successfully installed the audio plugin. Now you will be able to listen to all radio stations.

docs.title: How to Install SA:MP
docs.text: To be able to play on B-Zone's SA:MP server, you need 2 elements: * The game GTA San Andreas * The SA:MP application

docs.title: Downloading and installing the game using a virtual drive (.iso)
docs.text:
